title: Reconnection glitch
body:
Fixed 3 hours later



Im not sure where to put this as I'm new to these forums and dont plan on using them apart from this problem so if its possible to move this to the correct place/section please do so. I won a match about 20 minutes ago or longer and clicked the continue on the victory screen it then came up with retrieving the stats which stayed there for about 10 seconds. I then click skip waiting for stats which did nothing i tried twice more. So I just closed the game then reopened it and it came up with reconnect to the match/game cant remember exactly what it says but i thought it must be a glitch so i closed it and reopened it came up again. I asked my duo partner if he had the same problem after that match and he said yes but his worked once he reopened it. I then tried 3 times to connect to the 'match' which was non-existent with the same box saying i failed to connect to servers and giving me the option to retry or be left with a black screen. I now restarted my computer to no avail but i logged on with my other account and it came up with the home screen so i think its a problem on your side and not mine anyway if you could help it would be greatly appreciated because right now i cant aply any games on my account
Regards, Yomanxj


Edit: It says game abandoned, you have left a game in progress. Please reconnect to the game. It also says the match doesnt exist on my match history on this website

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is called a Ghost Game, these usually occur when there are server issues and the game doesn't correctly report as completed.

These usually resolve themselves within a few hours, Judging from the time of your post, this should've been resolved by now.

if you're still experiencing this issue now, please let me know.
